import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import NewsCard from '../components/NewsCard' function Home() { const [news, setNews] = useState([]) const [pendingApiCall, setPendingApiCall] = useState(true) const [subject, setSubject] = useState("latest") useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://newsapi.org/v2/top-headlines?country=tr&apiKey=f440eaf214bf4f48ad71022fcb003e5b`, {}) .then((res) => { setPendingApiCall(false) setNews(res.data) console.log(res.data); }) }, [subject]) handleOnClick=(subject)=>{ axios.get(`https://newsapi.org/v2/top-headlines/sources?category=${subject}&apiKey=f440eaf214bf4f48ad71022fcb003e5b`, {}) .then((res) => { setPendingApiCall(false) setNews(res.data) console.log(res.data); }) } return ( <> {pendingApiCall ?
